name: Two-Front
description:
A shooter without shooting – How long can you survive the Great War?

Right at the climax of the war between nations, you as an unarmed man must outsmart and survive against countless threats from enemies coming from all directions. Use the nation’s rivalry and friendly fire as your only way to survive the Great War!

controls:

arrow keys / WASD = move

Ctrl = Crouch

Shift= Sprint

Credits:

Artwork/Pixel Artist : Ryan Hui

Programmer : Andrew Shi

Sound: Various Artists  from royalty free sites
